title: How I’m Playing Oil For 10.6% Dividends

title: September Quarter Earnings Won’t Juice Trump’s Stock Market
text: The stock market has multiple headwinds going into September quarter earnings including a sluggish economy, stronger dollar and above average valuations. You also shouldn’t expect management’s guidance to be optimist given President Trump’s impeachment and ongoing trade wars.

title: Investing Insights: Cheap Dividend Payers, Short-Term Bond Funds, and More
text: In this week’s podcast, Ultimate Stock Pickers highlights three cheap dividend payers with moats, Christine Benz invites Judith Ward from T. Rowe Price to share highlights from new research on retirement preparedness, equity analyst Matthew Dolgin shares why CenturyLink is a bargain, Russ Kinnel picks his favorite short-term bond funds for investors looking to reduce risk, Jon Hale invites Karin Anderson to discuss new fixed income research on how asset managers are approaching sustainability.

title: Buffett's Deception On Gold
text: Warren Buffett is not a fan of gold. But since 2001 gold has outperformed the stock market by more than 360%.

title: US pulling investment from China would be an 'unmitigated disaster,' says Yale's Stephen Roach
text: U.S.-China trade talks hit a snag Friday as the White House weighed limiting U.S. investments in China, which would be an "unmitigated disaster" if it came to pass, says Yale's Stephen Roach.

title: Hubris of a high-flyer: how investors brought WeWork founder down to earth
